name: WEEX Token
description: WEEX Token (WXT) is the native platform token of the WEEX exchange and designed to offer loyal WEEX users exclusive benefits and substantial value returns. By holding and using WXT, users can share in the long-term rewards of WEEX's rapid growth. Benefits include trading fee discounts, priority access to platform promotions, and other value-added services, all of which enhance the trading experience and long-term profit opportunities.
